Articles.Content:
Some stock spaceplanes use the Panther, but none have it in wet mode by default or an action to toggle it.

An auto-switch function for the afterburner would be convenient to have, the auto-switch will activate the afterburner if the throttle is max, and deactivate the afterburner if throttle was decreased. The auto-switch can also be disabled.

I would like this if the engine TWR or efficiency dropped below a certain number.

Edited February 5, 2016 by RA3236
